message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't have it all, let's start with a better offer
I'll give you a better deal, but you have to meet me halfway
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm willing to give you a better deal, but don't expect me to give it all away
You're getting close to giving me everything, might as well finish it now
I'm not giving up yet, I'll give you a decent deal if you meet me in the middle
You're running out of options, take it or leave it
I'm not giving up, I'll give you the whole thing if you'll just take it
